title.narrative: Improved Management of Financial and Human resources in pursuit of results

description.narrative: UN Women Nigeria will uphold cooperate policies and guidelines in the Management of Financial resources to ensure accountability and transparency. It will also endeavour to recruit and strengthen the capacities of qualified staff, and in the right number to deliver the results of the SN/AWP.
